description: A single 30-year uncoupled (atmosphere and land) simulation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice distributions are specified and vegetation may interact.  Aerosols and ozone scaled to 2 x present day (2015) values, sea ice and other anthropogenic forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, PD aer O3x2, present day aerosols and ozone x2, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
long_name: RFMIP effective radiative forcing of aerosols and ozone scaled by 2
rationale: Explore forcing impacts of non-linearity of aerosol cloud interactions.

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea surface temperature from the piControl experiment
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: PIControlSST

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea ice concentration from the piControl experiment.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SIC, sea ice, sea ice concentration
requirements.label: PIControlSIC

requirements.description: Impose present day (2015) aerosol concentrations / emissions x2.
requirements.label: 2015Aerosolsx2

requirements.description: Impose present day (2015) aerosol precursor concentrations / emissions x2.
requirements.label: 2015AerPrex2

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding aerosols and ozone.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding aerosols, excluding ozone
requirements.label: piForcingExcludngAerO3
